item.title: 我们对 UMG 与 Tiktok 的谈判现状进行了报道：包括首席执行官在内的 Tiktok 高管多次与环球公司联系，试图重启谈判。Tiktok 提出向 UMG 支付 "低个位数 "的广告收入。TT 最近提高了这一报价：
item.description:
Our report on the state of play in UMG vs Tiktok:

Tiktok execs, including the CEO, have repeatedly contacted Universal trying to restart talks.
Tiktok offered to pay UMG a “low single-digit” % of its ad revenue. TT recently upped that offer.
more here:https://t.co/6AHE5Bb1Vx pic.twitter.com/NvrWqGkwc2

— Anna Nicolaou (@annaknicolaou) February 28, 2024

item.title: 七国集团（G7）的盟国冻结了价值约 3,000 亿欧元的俄罗斯主权资产。但在如何使用这些资产的问题上缺乏协商
item.description:
G7 allies have frozen about €300bn worth of Russian sovereign assets. But there is a lack of census over how to use them https://t.co/oteGCs0jDH pic.twitter.com/rPOiI3mJgE

— Financial Times (@FT) February 28, 2024

item.title: 活动家的家人说，克里姆林宫曾勒索阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的母亲秘密埋葬他，并试图阻止支持者举行公开葬礼
item.description:
The Kremlin had blackmailed Alexei Navalny’s mother into burying him in secret, and had tried to prevent supporters from holding a public funeral, the activist’s family said https://t.co/rhwpbIHtV9 pic.twitter.com/rxHxNnFsdN

— Financial Times (@FT) February 28, 2024

item.title: 2024 年本应是企业税收竞相逐低的终结之年，但一项备受瞩目的跨国公司征税全球协议的实施似乎受到了威胁。以下为 @ft 提供的《颠覆时代
item.description:
2024 was meant to be the year that the race to the bottom in corporate taxation ended, but the implementation of a much-heralded global deal on how multinationals are taxed appears to be under threat. Here's Disrupted Times https://t.co/tiSzo2mHk0 via @ft

— darrendodd (@darrendodd) February 28, 2024

item.title: 芯片制造商必须以前所未有的方式重新思考半导体架构，而公司的技术声誉和财务状况取决于是否下了正确的赌注。
